welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Fafe, the charming city known for its stunning natural landscapes and warm hospitality. We invite you to immerse yourself in our rich culture and indulge in the delicious local cuisine. Enjoy your stay and make unforgettable memories in Fafe!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Braga Airport serves domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Vila Real Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Vila Real Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal mainly used for low-cost carriers and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport. Connect to the network and follow the instructions to access.
